findings.rationale: The two-year duration for confidentiality may not be sufficient to protect sensitive information, especially if the information has long-term value.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to ambiguity about what is actually protected, potentially resulting in disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other.

findings.rationale: The absence of specified consequences for breach of confidentiality may lead to insufficient deterrence against unauthorized disclosure of information.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party agrees to: Maintain strict confidentiality.
